doc:
Robert Walden https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Walden 0 Robert Walden (born Robert Wolkowitz; September 25, 1943) is an American television and motion picture actor. He is best known for his role as Joe Rossi on Lou Grant,:625 which earned him three Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Drama Series nominations; for his role as Joe Waters on Brothers; and as Glenn Newman on Happily Divorced. Walden is also well known for starring in the films Blue Sunshine, The Hospital, All the President's Men, Audrey Rose, and Capricorn One. Robert_Walden ( born Robert_Wolkowitz ; September_25_,_1943 ) is an_American_television_and_motion_picture_actor . He is_best_known for his_role as Joe_Rossi on Lou_Grant , : 625_which earned him three_Primetime_Emmy_Award for Outstanding_Supporting_Actor in a_Drama_Series_nominations ; for his_role as Joe_Waters on Brothers ; and as Glenn_Newman on Happily_Divorced . Walden is_also_well_known for starring in the_films Blue_Sunshine , The_Hospital , All the_President 's_Men , Audrey_Rose , and Capricorn_One .
